Homestead.definition: the home and adjoining land with any buildings that is occupied usually by a family as its principal residence b

1 a.definition: the home and adjoining land with any buildings that is occupied usually by a family as its principal residence

sub_terms.b: an estate created by law in a homestead esp. for the purpose of taking advantage of a homestead exemption

2.definition: a tract of land acquired from U.S. public lands by filing a record and living on and cultivating the tract
